overview: Fernando is touring and has half a dozen projects in development. His fans adore him and he is a frequent guest on The Charlie E. Gimpson Late Evening Show which has been making the rounds since 1993 starting on channel 1 before moving to 2 in 1998 and eventually 3 in 2001.  All seems well for Fernando although he finds it difficult to keep his own life separate from the one that he shares with the rest of the world, a minor intrusion on his personal life will send him over the edge.
title: The Charlie E. Gimpson Show
